channel.title: CVE Feed for Avast/AVG -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avast/AVG -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5760|2024-08-02T08:07:32.642Z -- avast%2Favg -- avast%2Favg%20antivirus
item.description: A time-of-check to time-of-use (TOCTOU) bug in handling of IOCTL (input/output control) requests. This TOCTOU bug leads to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability which can be further exploited, allowing an attacker to gain full local privilege escalation on the system.This issue affects Avast/Avg Antivirus: 23.8.
